Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Estes
ShortDescription: Southbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy, Sheridan, Morse, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Estes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy, Sheridan, Morse, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Estes.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
